entry.title: third post
entry.summary: Wow. Time flies. 5 years later, 3rd post….

entry.title: second post
entry.content: Some minor color and formatting changes. Needs more work. Hope to be blogging about more than just the blog soon. This was not intended to be some kind of meta-blog :-)
entry.summary: Some minor color and formatting changes. Needs more work. Hope to be blogging about more than just the blog soon. This was not intended to be some kind of meta-blog :-)

entry.title: first post
entry.content:
Hello everyone.

So I’ve finally kind of turned this into a blog. It’s still a work in progress. Hopefully I’ll update this regularly. We’ll see. I first created this site in February and haven’t really done anthing with it until now.

Commenting will come soon as well as some other UI tweaks
